structure.unit: Chapter 33B AREAS OF CRITICAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERN

law.catch_line: Consistency with Chapter 33 (Zoning Code) of the Code.

text.section: Notwithstanding anything in (Zoning Code) of the Code of Metropolitan Miami-Dade County to the contrary, the provisions of this division shall be deemed to supersede all conflicting provisions. This division is intended to ensure an equitable distribution of development rights throughout the county as a means of addressing the burdens of protecting public and private resources of the East Everglades as defined herein.
